summary: I PURCHASED A 2002 CHEVROLET HD2500 WITH A 8100 LITER ENGINE.  I HAVE NOW BEEN TOLD THAT THIS ENGINE WILL USE 1 QUART OF OIL FOR EACH 1,000 MILES DRIVEN.  I BELIEVE THAT THIS IS AN EXCESSIVE AMOUNT OF OIL TO BE USED IN A NEW VEHICLE.  HAS CHEVROLET DONE ANYTHING TO CORRECT THIS MISTAKE.  IS THERE A RECALL FOR THIS PROBLEM?
